alert.note: Alert for Charles Mix; Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 12:33AM MDT until June 25 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Charles Mix County in south central South Dakota... Southeastern Gregory County in south central South Dakota... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 133 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Pickstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pickstown around 155 AM CDT. Marty around 200 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include southwestern Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
